summary: This is a retexture of a few of the armours from asianboy345\'s super TERA Armor Collection UNP that was redone for CBBE by Frigus.   My intent is to do something similar to the other great armours in the collection and make available if there is any interest.
descriptionHtml:
[img=50x50]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35977-3-1369010510.jpg[/img]

[size=20][b][color=blue]Tera Armour Retexture for CBBE[/color][/b][/size]

[url=https://vimeo.com/67972863]TBBS implemented [/url] by forexcorso with UNP body.

[color=Red]Thanks everyone who uploaded an image. Keep them coming![/color]

Version 1.6: Added Quantum, White Mage and Elven Scaled.
Version 1.51: Just adjusted a few textures that had some unwanted pieces of fabric.
Version 1.5: added Castanic Hunter and Trielek retextures.
    Note: I had to do some changes to the meshes so if you are loading it manually don\'t forget to load the new meshes.
Version 1.4: added Blade Dancer and Atroscine retextures.
    Note: I had to do some changes to the meshes so if you are loading it manually don\'t forget to load the new meshes.

Version 1.3: added Gildhorn retextures.
Version 1.2: added Royalrite, Voidmeld, and Silver Spellsword retextures.
Version 1.1: added Steelgaze retexture.
Version 1.0: added Devinesight retexture.

[color=blue]This is a retexture of a few of the armours from asianboy345\'s TERA Armor Collection UNP that was redone for CBBE by Frigus.  You need to first install the TERA Armor Collection - CBBE - standaloneby Frigus found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29411.  My intent is to do something similar to the others great armours in the collection and make available if there is any interest.[/color]

The armours ingame are called:
[color=red]
     Atroscine
     Quantum
     Elven Scaled
     White Mage
     Trielek
     Castanic Hunter
     Blade Dancer
     Deathskin
     Brigandine
     Devinesight
     Royalrite
     Voidmeld
     Silver Spellsword 
     Steelgaze
[/color]

I\'m not much of a wing person so there are two versions. One with wings and one without. Right now you can\'t have both but I will soon make a version where wings are separate armour pieces.

After I\'ve finished a few in CBBE I\'ll do the UNP version. You can find the most current UNP version at: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35931

Upload any photos you take.

Thank you asianboy345 for permission to do this retexture.

Requirements
========================================================================================
TERA Armor Collection - CBBE - standaloneby Frigus
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition v3.2.3
Skyrim v1.8

Credits
========================================================================================
TERA Armor Collection - CBBE - standaloneby Frigus
asianboy345 for his great armor mod: TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female
Calientes for the Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition 
En Masse for the meshes
author: CherylOh
